messages.content: Theresa May and Dr. Caroline Johnson – Strong and Stable Leadership for Sleaford and North Hykeham and for Britain

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest and is essential for our security and prosperity.
Strong and stable leadership with me in the national interest to see us through Brexit and beyond.

mentions.tacticalSituation: If Labour under Jeremy Corbyn get a majority, he would embrace policies that would weaken our armed forces and would raise taxes.

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest. By negotiating Brexit, which we would all pay for in higher taxes, fewer jobs, more waste and more debt.
issues.defence: He (Jeremy Corbyn) would embrace policies that would weaken our armed forces and would raise taxes.
issues.economy: This is a unique and crucial election for our country. By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand, we can guarantee our economic security. With a clear and credible economic plan, we can make a success of Brexit and ensure our economy works for everyone by securing well-paid jobs, lower taxes and stronger public finances. Jeremy Corbyn's coalition of chaos would bring a weaker economy.

endorsements.endorsement: Strong and stable leadership with Theresa May and Dr. Caroline Johnson for Sleaford and North Hykeham and for Britain.

quotes.text: Theresa May and Dr. Caroline Johnson – Strong and Stable Leadership for Sleaford and North Hykeham and for Britain

examples: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest
If Jeremy Corbyn wins in Sleaford and North Hykeham constituency, his position is strengthened (tactical voting).
Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest.
We can guarantee our economic security.
We can make a success of Brexit and ensure our economy works for everyone by securing well-paid jobs, lower taxes and stronger public finances.
Theresa May endorses Dr. Caroline Johnson.
If Jeremy Corbyn wins in Sleaford and North Hykeham constituency, his position is strengthened (tactical voting).
Jeremy Corbyn's coalition of chaos leading to a weaker economy.
Jeremy Corbyn would embrace policies that would weaken our armed forces and would raise taxes.
